snippet: In theory, any flood-damaged automobile can be fixed, but when a contemporary vehicle, packed with electronics, is submerged in water to dashboard level, the cost of repairing the car will almost certainly exceed its value.
abstract: In theory, any flood-damaged automobile can be fixed, but when a contemporary vehicle, packed with electronics, is submerged in water to dashboard level, the cost of repairing the car will almost certainly exceed its value.

headline.main: Wring Out That Ride: Submerged Older Vehicles May Be Salvageable
